South Florida's Best Pressure Cleaners

Let's Clean It Up.

Who are we?

Code 3 Pressure Cleaners is dedicated to operating with the highest of standards and we stand behind our quality workmanship. I started this business with my father in order to provide the utmost level of quality that jobs like this require. We have come a long way, and strive to continue to lead the way!

No matter how large or small the job, it gets the same attention to detail and quality of service. Our procedure for pressure cleaning is very simple. We use a high pressure power washer which expels extremely hot water. This hot water flow kills the mold on contact while washing away and clearing all of the dirt that has gathered on the surface.

You’ll be able to enjoy a cleaner property that is safe and healthy. Mold-covered brick, concrete and more can become hazardous and make your property look run down. Our process will make your walkways and patios dirt and mold-free! You’ll have fresh and safe sceneries and walking areas in no time.

The guys over at Code 3 Pressure Cleaning did everything and more. They left my property looking spotless, and saved me a fortune. Highly recommend them to anyone and everyone.

- Alexis Toller

Roof and Tile

Supreme service and delivery. We work hard to ensure that your various textiles remain clean and protected for years to come. We take pride in our tireless efforts to leave you satisfied.

Backyard and Patio

We can take years of any appliances or fixtures to save you money and hassle. dont spend thousands on new installations when all thats necessary is some rejuvenation.

Residential and Business

From Mold, mildew, and roots, to weeds, and more, our procedures will remove all unwanted blemishes and reveal the true beauty of all sidewalks, walkways, driveways, and much more...

Why Choose Us?

When it comes to proper care of your residential or business needs, we hold ourselves to a high standard. We're passionate about what we do and make sure everything is thoroughly done. We leave no stone un-turned. We strive to be the industry leaders while also maintaining the friendly and helpful customer service that you get with a small business like us.
